name: BriskBlock
description:
My second 30-day-game! This was developed entirely in the month of February as part of a New-Year's resolution to make a full game every month.

Use the mouse (or touch on mobile!) to slide blocks and rotate the board. Don't let any blocks get hit with lasers, and drag blocks on bonus tiles for extra points!

Features:

  • Fast-Paced-Brain-Burning Spatial Puzzles!
  • 7 Unlockable Color Schemes
  • A High-Score System
  • Original Art, Music, Sound

I hope you enjoy!
